item.title: Where Are the New Contributors; Reflections from a Recent Newbie
item.description: I’ve spent quite a long time since thinking about this, not least since I’m embarking on this journey. It also interests me on a selfish level to consider the longevity of a career in open source, if I am going to embark on one. I figured it may be worth documenting my experiences if it could even make us a little closer as a community to figuring out how to make people want to look at large scary codebases, much less improve on it.
